name: Wärtsilä Corporation
bossPosition: Executive Vice President, Corporate Relations and Legal
membership: EUGINE, Conferation of Finnish Industries, Federation of Finnish Technology Industries, Eurelectric, SolarPowerEurope, EEF, Cogen Europe, Euromot
goal: Wärtsilä is a global leader in smart technologies and complete lifecycle solutions for the marine and energy markets. By emphasising sustainable innovation, total efficiency and data analytics, Wärtsilä maximises the environmental and economic performance of the vessels and power plants of its customers. In 2017, Wärtsilä's net sales totalled EUR 4.9 billion with approximately 18,000 employees. The company has operations in over 200 locations in more than 80 countries around the world. Wärtsilä is listed on Nasdaq Helsinki.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Energy policy, clean transport, sustainable shipping, digital transport, smart energy
